name: Rails Autoscale Demo
description: A barebones Rails app, built for exploring the Rails Autoscale Heroku add-on

PROCFILE.description: The specified Procfile determines the job backend.

BUNDLE_WITHOUT.description: This is used by the Ruby buildpack to avoid installing unwanted job backends. By default we're only installing Sidekiq.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Controls the number of Puma processes (concurrent requests) per dyno.

RAILS_MAX_THREADS.description: Controls Puma threads and web database pool.

WORKER_THREADS.description: Controls worker threads (Sidekiq only) and worker database pool.
